title: Saturn Transit in the 11th House for Leo Ascendant
summary: Saturn transiting the eleventh house restructures goals, gains, and social networks for Leo ascendants. Progress toward aspirations becomes slow but sustainable. Friendships and associations are tested for usefulness and integrity, trimming excess connections. Gains come through disciplined planning rather than luck. This phase rewards patience, long-term vision, and responsibility toward collective objectives, turning realistic goals into dependable achievements.

sections.heading: Career
points: Support from senior or disciplined allies

closing: This transit aligns ambition with realism. By committing to steady effort, your goals solidify into lasting achievements.
